title: Delayed delivery beyond estimated date
description: Customer reports that the package has not arrived 3 days after the estimated delivery date.
summary: Package delivery delayed; investigation underway to locate the shipment and expedite delivery.

title: Damaged package received
description: Customer received package with visible damage to the box and contents inside.
resolution: Replacement item sent and damage reported to courier service.
summary: Package arrived damaged; replacement sent and courier notified.

title: Incorrect delivery address
description: Package was delivered to the wrong address, customer did not receive it.
summary: Package misdelivered; contacting courier to reroute to the correct address.

title: Tracking information not updating
description: Customer cannot track the shipment as the tracking status has not been updated in 48 hours.
resolution: Tracking information refreshed; shipment located and updates sent to customer.
summary: Tracking info delayed; updates provided and shipment on track.

title: Missing package
description: Customer claims package is marked as delivered but was not received.
summary: Package marked delivered but not received; escalation with courier underway.

title: Request for Saturday delivery
description: Customer requests package delivery on Saturday instead of weekday.
summary: Customer requested weekend delivery; flagged for scheduling team.

title: Signature required not requested
description: Customer wants signature confirmation added to their delivery for security reasons.
resolution: Signature confirmation added for delivery; customer notified.
summary: Signature confirmation updated on shipment as requested.

title: Multiple packages arrived separately
description: Customer expected a combined delivery but packages arrived in separate shipments.
resolution: Explained split delivery due to weight restrictions; offered compensation.
summary: Multiple shipments delivered; customer compensated for inconvenience.

title: Wrong item delivered
description: Customer received a different product than ordered.
resolution: Replaced incorrect item and arranged return of the wrong item.
summary: Wrong item delivered; replacement shipped and return arranged.

title: International shipment stuck in customs
description: Customerâ€™s international order is delayed due to customs clearance issues.
summary: Shipment delayed at customs; working with carrier and customs agents to clear delivery.
